attributes.action: Allow the Petitions Committee to schedule debates on motions of no confidence.
attributes.additional_details:
This is in response to the result of 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104471

(Petition calling for a motion of no confidence in David Cameron.)
attributes.background:
In a statement today (Nov 19)  the House of Commons Petitions committee said that it "has decided not to schedule a debate on this petition, because the Committee does not have the power to schedule debates on motions of no confidence".

We feel they should have the power to schedule such debates.
